mapper.select: SELECT configkey, subkey, configinfo, isdel FROM ${table} WHERE username = #{username} AND host = #{host} AND version > #{version} ORDER BY update_time;
mapper.update: UPDATE ${table} SET version = #{version}, isdel = #{isdel}, configinfo = #{value}, operate_plat = #{operate_plat}, update_time = now() WHERE username = #{username} and host = #{host} and configkey = #{key} and subkey = #{subkey};
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(MAX(version), 0) FROM ${table} WHERE username = #{username} AND host = #{host};
